## Quick Summary
One-sentence summary of your proposal.

## Before Submitting
Have you read the RFC process? See [RFC/README.md](../RFC/README.md)

For large changes, you should submit a full RFC document instead of just an issue.

## Proposal Sketch
Brief description of what you want to change and why.

- [ ] I will submit a full RFC using RFC/TEMPLATE.md
- [ ] This is a small change that doesn't need a full RFC
